Yeah, I think the overkill will put an end to questions - perfect. Still up
I see.

 

Gordon

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Jim Gilbert [mailto:jggilbert@...] 
Sent: Tuesday, October 28, 2003 2:10 PM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] missing national treasures

 

Gordon,
Assuming that you're just talking about swords, Albert Yamanaka published a
list with descriptions in his newsletters, although I have no idea if it is
complete or correct.  He has 14 Kokuho and 25 Juyo Bijutsuhin described.
This was a particular area of interest of the late Jim Kurrasch and he
published something on his web site at
http://members.cox.net/jkk/misimpor.htm  Not all of the items that Yamanaka
mentioned are on Jim's site.

What exactly is she looking for?

Jim
  ----- 


  Hi all,



  I've had a request from a mom helping with a school project concerning the
  missing NTs from after WWII. She would like to know what is on the list.
  Anyone got a copy somewhere?



  Gordon
